summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to two recipients regarding the upcoming trial in United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The prosecutor requests a call to discuss the trial and asks for availability.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, which is the topic of the email correspondence regarding the upcoming trial.

events.title: Prosecutor correspondence about Maxwell trial
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails two recipients to schedule a call to discuss the upcoming trial in United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations.name: Southern District of New York
locations.context: The federal judicial district prosecuting the case.

locations.name: New York, NY 10007
locations.context: The location of the prosecutor's office.

keyFacts: The document is an email from a federal prosecutor regarding the trial of Ghislaine Maxwell.
The email is dated September 20, 2021, indicating ongoing trial preparations at that time.
The case is officially titled United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
The prosecutor is seeking to coordinate with two recipients (names not provided in the excerpt) about the trial.
